cause.description:
If you think just one person can't make a difference you're wrong. Everyone should try and do one or two things to help our enviorment. There are so many ways around polluting our earth now a days that this shouldn't be a hard task. Just think about your future and the future of your children. We need to make some changes!!
1. Start using energy saving appliences
2. Start sorting out recycling/ DO NOT Litter
3. Flick Off
cause.mission: Stop the usage of plastic grocerie bags
cause.name: Global Warming Isn't Cool
